description: Try our easy to follow Rainbow Fruit Yoghurt Pops recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Mango,Peanut free
name: Rainbow Fruit Yoghurt Pops Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place 1 cup of the yoghurt in a bowl. Stir in honey to taste, if desired. Spoon 1 tbs into each hole of 12 x 80ml iceblock moulds. Place in freezer.
Separate berries. Place 1/2 cup of the blueberries and blackberries in a bowl and 1/2 cup of the strawberries and raspberries in a second bowl. Defrost.
pur√©e each fruit (mango, kiwifruit, combined berries) with 1/2 cup of the yoghurt mixture to taste, until smooth. Transfer each mixture to separate bowls. Place in fridge until needed.
Layer each one of the fruit mixtures into moulds, freezing each layer for 30 minutes before adding the next. Insert sticks when adding the fourth layer. Freeze for at least 6 hours or until firm.
To remove, dip moulds in hot water.
